description:
This week brings us Vic, a straight muscular stud who has has been out of the Marines for just a few months.
He did a few stints in Iraq and after almost being blown up he decided he'd had enough. I asked him about his service and what he had to say was really interesting,
He's wanting to settle down and have a family, but I don't think the girl he's with is the one. She wants sex several times a day and was mad at Vic for leaving to come visit us. While he was here, she was constantly calling him on his cell phone. Girls...
Vic's got a big set of balls and a nice dick with a big vein running along the top. He's still very militaristic, though, and when he poked fun at the job I had done making the bed, I made him strip and give me a demonstration of how they do it in the Marines!
title: Vic
